title: Aztec Ruins National Monument: Traveling Trunks
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Traveling Trunks              Traveling Trunks         Replica artifacts and trunk   Replica trunks can be checked out for use in your classroom or reserved for on-site visits.  Unfortunately, they are too big to ship and must be picked up at the park. The trunks include numerous replica artifacts, the Footprints of the Past video, and a teacher's guide. The teacher's guide includes lesson plans, activities, and suggestions for planning a field trip. Call 505-334-6174 ext. 228 to reserve a trunk for your classroom.
